name: Chomp vs Wachomp (Giant ROM 4)
description:
Chomp more gold than your rival WACHOMP!

One on one local chomper made in my spare time for Giant ROM 4 game jam, the anual game jam for the best games site around, videogames.com.

Hope you like it :D

Controls:

This uses the first and second Xbox controllers for input only, sorry :(

Credits:

Music is "mode7" by The Hamster Alliance
